biotools.summary:
A Normalized Measure of Codon Usage Preferences.

COUSIN is a bioinformatic tool which aims to calculate the Codon Usage Preferences (CUPrefs) of sequences using a novel index named COUSIN. In addition, numerous functions are proposed to enhance your CUPrefs analysis experience !

bioschemas.name: Codon Usage Similarity Index (COUSIN)
